titles: A catechisme or institution of the christen religion. Newely set forthe by Richard Tauerner
author: Taverner, Richard, 1505?-1575.
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio, ad imprimendum solum.
Imperfect; lacks leaf D6 and quire G; leaves L6 and L7 are fragments; lacks all after leaf L7; numerous misfoliations.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Catechisms --  Early works to 1800.
